did.unittitle: South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums
did.abstract: The South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums date from circa 1850 to 1922 and contain 52 items. The albums are composed of cabinet card portraits of bank trustees, many of whom are identified on album pages. In addition, each volume contains a name index.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums date from circa 1850 to 1922 and contain 52 items. The albums are composed of cabinet card portraits of bank trustees, many of whom are identified on album pages. In addition, each volume contains a name index.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids note
otherfindaid.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials note
relatedmaterial.p: Brooklyn Historical Society possesses three related collections:

South Brooklyn Savings Bank records (2007.001), Independence Community Bank oral histories (2008.032), and eight oil on canvas portaits of bank presidents, 1850 to 1973 (M2007.023.1 through M2007.023.8.). Item-level descriptions and digital versions of all eight portaits are available for searching via the image database in the Othmer Library.
